sentences.en: Amazingly, these mitochondria were once free - living bacteria that were captured by an early single - celled eukaryote.
sentences.cn: 令人惊奇的是, 这些线粒体曾是被早期 单细胞 真核生物俘获的自生细菌.

sentences.en: Grypania may have been either a bacterial colony or a eukaryote — an organism with specialized cells, enclosed in a membrane.
sentences.cn: 卷曲藻可能是一个菌落，或者一种真核生物——其包裹在细胞膜内的细胞功能已经出现分化的生物体。

sentences.en: Many research teams have been striving to determine the structure of a eukaryote ribosome (see 'Structures of desire').
sentences.cn: 许多研究小组力求确定一个真核核糖的结构（看到向往的结构）。

sentences.en: Scientists now know that this common ancestor, 'the first eukaryote', was a lot more sophisticated than any known bacterium.
sentences.cn: 科学家现在知道，这个共同的祖先，“第一真核生物”比任何已知的细菌都要复杂得多。

trans.tran_en: any member of the Eukarya, a domain of organisms having cells each with a distinct nucleus within which the genetic material is contained
